name: Just Ride
title: Design Fashion
desc: Just your everyday smooth, comfy tee, a wardrobe staple/ Slim fit, so size up if you prefer a looser fit, or check out the Classic T-Shirt. Midweight 4.2 oz. / 145 gsm fabric, solid color t-shirts are 100% cotton, heather grey t-shirts are 90% cotton/10% polyester charcoal heather t-shirts are 52% cotton/48% polyester. The third party printer of this product is evaluated according to International Labor Organization standards. The printer of this product sources blanks from manufacturers committed to improving cotton farming practices with the Better Cotton Initiative
